DataElement.preferredName: Nodal Biopsy Visible Node Not Performed Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether the reason a nodal biopsy was not performed was due to visible nodes in the AP region on a CT scan.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Nodal Biopsy Visible Node Not Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to visible nodes and nodal biopsies not performed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Nodal; of or pertaining to a node, any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part.:Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.

Concepts.definition: Of or pertaining to a node, any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part.
The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: Perceptible especially by the eye; open to easy view.:Any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part.:used for negation of a word or group of words.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: Perceptible especially by the eye; open to easy view.
Any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part.
used for negation of a word or group of words.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.
